channel.title: Changing weapon requirements
channel.description:
Hey, ok well I want too change the requirements for a weapon. It is a weapon meant for admins only and to make sure no one else can use, I want to set the attack lvl required to 100, because when you become an admin you're attack is set to 100, no one else can get this. So only admins can wear it.
How do I edit the weapon's requirements?

item.title: Changing weapon requirements
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
